title: Spare wheel cover
text: A spare wheel cover or spare tire cover is an accessory that covers the <a href="Spare%20tire">spare wheel</a> mounted on external part of a car or van. On <a href="4x4%20vehicles">4x4 vehicles</a> the spare wheel is normally rear mounted and is often printed with a dealer's name or something more fun. Covers can be hard shells or soft vinyl covers. Spare wheel cover protects spare tires from the dirt and the <a href="sun">sun</a>'s harmful <a href="UV%20rays">UV rays</a> in areas with many days of sunshine. Spare wheel covers need to be removed once in a while and cleaned.
